intro: Alocasia heteroneura, commonly known as the zigzag alocasia, is a tropical plant native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its striking, arrow-shaped leaves that have a distinctive zigzag pattern along the midrib. The plant belongs to the Araceae family, which includes many ornamental and edible species. Alocasia heteroneura thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-draining, fertile soil. Its foliage makes it a popular choice for indoor gardening and tropical landscapes.
